faqs.question: What is Give Me Trees Foundation?
responses: Give Me Trees Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to environmental conservation through tree planting since 1978.
Give Me Trees (GMTT) is an environmental organization focused on planting trees and creating green spaces across India.

faqs.question: How can I donate to Give Me Trees?
responses: You can donate through their website givemetrees.org or via their official banking channels.
Visit givemetrees.org/donate to contribute to their tree planting initiatives.

faqs.question: Where does Give Me Trees plant trees?
responses: Give Me Trees plants trees across India, focusing on both urban and rural areas.
They work in various locations including Delhi, Haryana, Rajasthan and other states in India.
